[h1]Cultista/eletricista simulator, quer dizer, brincadeira de gato e rato, mais ou menos isso...[/h1]

Dead by Daylight, ou DBD para os mais √≠ntimos, √© um jogo multijogador no formato 4x1, onde temos 4 sobreviventes que precisam reparar geradores para poderem escapar* e 1 assassino ca√ßando-os. Em sumo a jogabilidade de assassino √©: procurar sobreviventes, sobrevivente encontrado -> perseguir e derrubar, pegar e enganchar o sobrevivente nos ganchos de sacrif√≠cio espalhados pelo mapa, ???, vit√≥ria, ou n√£o...E a jogabilidade de sobrevivente: localizar um gerador, consertar, abrir port√£o e fugir.

Claro, h√° diversas outras maneiras de se jogar, mas o b√°sico √© este. O jogo conta com mais de 25 assassinos e sobreviventes, e cada assassino tem seus pr√≥prio conjunto de habilidades, exemplos: o Mercen√°rio possui uma arma com arp√£o que pode ser atirado, depois √© preciso recarregar a arma; a Ca√ßadora possui machadinhas arremess√°veis que podem ser recarregadas em arm√°rios; a Enfermeira possui habilidade de teleporte, o Ca√ßador possui armadilhas de urso em que os sobreviventes podem ficar presos; entre outros.

N√£o h√° um modo ranqueado mas existe um ranque de classifica√ß√£o para cada fila (sobrevivente e assassino) que √© levada em conta na hora de parear com outros jogadores.

Como todo jogo multijogador, sempre ter√£o pessoas t√≥xicas querendo estragar tua partida (tanto de sobrevivente quanto de assassino), mas [u]n√£o deixe que isso te abale[/u], pois h√° tamb√©m muitas pessoas de bom cora√ß√£o dispostas a te ajudar e ensinar sobre o jogo. N√£o existe bate-papo durante a partida, apenas no sagu√£o pr√©-partida (entre sobreviventes) e no p√≥s-partida (entre todos os jogadores). Caso n√£o queira ver o bate-papo, clique no bal√£o √† direita embaixo e oculte-o.

Comecei em meados de jun/2020 e a quantidade de jogadores era muito boa. Atualmente, jun/2021, essa quantia ainda se mant√©m, mas h√° uma peculiaridade da busca de partidas: durante o dia at√© o final da tarde √© mais f√°cil encontrar partidas de sobrevivente, e √† noite at√© a manh√£ isso se inverte e √© mais f√°cil encontrar de assassino (n√£o √© que n√£o encontre partidas de sobrevivente √† noite ou de assassino durante o dia, s√≥ demora um pouco).

*H√° uma mec√¢nica de escotilha para assegurar que pelo menos 1 sobrevivente restante consiga escapar, mas o assassino pode fech√°-la e ent√£o o sobrevivente precisar√° abrir um port√£o de sa√≠da para conseguir fugir.

[u]Recomendo![/u] E se tiver amigos que queiram jogar, [u]recomendo ainda mais[/u]! Sozinho j√° √© divertido, mas em grupo √© sempre melhor.

A fantastic game that runs well. Similar to a commonly known custom game called Cat and Mouse or [name] Tag, you either play as a survivor or killer. It is absolutely terrifying as a survivor and fun to try and avoid the killer. As a killer it is quite tricky to play well. In either role, this game really gets the blood pumping. There's a lot of real-time strategy involved too! Every time you do a task such as to repair a generator to escape, you will have skill checks that require you to pay attention while you are looking out for the killer. There are daily missions that give bonus points and a set of seasonal challenges that promote trying different characters, utilizing different approaches etc.

I will say one caveat is that a lot of the content such as access to all of the killers and survivors is under a paywall. Some killers clearly need balancing as their tactics are a bit too difficult to handle. Case and point the pigman from Saw that forces you to go to a saw box to only get a small chance of removing your ticking timebomb of a helmet, or the Doctor that gets vision and slows people down with electricity, The clown with the poison, or the wraith with its insane speed and invisibility. 

Also the killers that just camp at hooks can go to hell.

Made lots of friends in this game. Happy to get rank 1 in a month. However, this game is full of bugs, connection issues and toxic randoms. MOST IMPORTANTLY. DBD DEVELOPERS ARE IDIOTS WHO NEVER FUCKIN CARE ABOUT THE COMMUNITY'S FEEDBACKS. This game is getting worst in every single fuckin new chapter. SO If you hate urself plz buy it.
makes me want to drink cleaning product

Don't get me wrong, this game is very fun (most of the time) and very addicting but there's so many downsides which caused me to take very long breaks. The devs just don't care anymore, never listening to the community and making very unnecessary changes. For example the SBMMR change, and the ranking system change. They won't even TELL us what determines what changes your MMR, it could be anything. It just makes no sense to me why they would focus on the least important things of the game instead of actually trying to improve. Another thing is whenever there's an update there's so many stupid bugs in the game, i'm pretty sure they don't even check if there's bugs before releasing an update. I actually kinda regret putting this much hours in the game and spending money on this game too much. Anyway, excuse me if i made any mistakes, i'm really tired while typing this out.
Great game! But you should play it for thousands of hours to be actually good at it

You run around as a crazed killer trying to kill as many people in the most brutal way and you play as a survivor that has to repair generators to open the escape gate while being hunted. Good concept, decent execution. 5/10
Game balance is good. Play as Killer is not too powerful. Love to play this game when I would like to relax.

Sehr gutes Spiel. Zusammengefasst kann man sagen, dass dieses Game alles hat was man f√ºr diese Kategorie braucht. Herzklopfen und Adrenalin in riskanten Situationen & Spannung in den letzten Sekunden vor dem Entkommen! Das Spielprinzip ist simpel und einfach zu lernen und perfektionieren. Es sind bekannte "Killer",-Horrorfilm-Charaktere mit im Spiel, die man sich gegen einen kleinen Preis freischalten kann, aber auch Eigenkreationen mit fesselnden Hintergrund-Geschichten. Zum Beispiel Freddy Kr√ºger oder aber Michael Myers. Ob mit Freunden oder neuen Teammates, ob als √úberlebender oder eben als Killer - ganz egal, es gibt so viele M√∂glichkeiten, dass Spiel f√ºr sich zu entdecken, dass es einem gar nicht langweilig werden kann :)
